name: ribbon bread basket
notes:
serve delicious hot breads for your family and friends in these stylish [ribbon bread baskets][1]. the simple, but beautiful [baskets][2] have that traditional scandinavian design look, which is easy to combine and match with other styles. [the baskets][3] are worked in our lovely [hobbii ribbon,][4] and the leather straps completes the look. 
make your [bread baskets][5] in your favourite colours to match your interior style. have fun :-)

**materials:**
- crochet hook 5-8 mm (us size h/8- l/11). read more in “tension”
- [hobbii ribbon][6]
- 10 and 7.5 cm leather strap 18 mm – nature
- 2 rivets 6x9 mm
- leather hole punch (optional)

**measurements:**
*large*: bottom approx. 18 cm, height approx. 8.5 cm.
*small*: bottom approx. 12 cm, height approx. 6.5 cm.

**usage approx.:** 
*large*: 190g 
*small*: 105g


  [1]: https://hobbii.com/ribbon-bread-baskets?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=ribbon-bread-baskets&utm_term=swr
  [2]: https://hobbii.com/ribbon-bread-baskets?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=ribbon-bread-baskets&utm_term=swr
  [3]: https://hobbii.com/ribbon-bread-baskets?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=ribbon-bread-baskets&utm_term=swr
  [4]: https://hobbii.com/ribbon-hobbii?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=ribbon&utm_term=swr
  [5]: https://hobbii.com/ribbon-bread-baskets?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=ribbon-bread-baskets&utm_term=swr
  [6]: https://hobbii.com/ribbon-hobbii?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=ribbon&utm_term=swr
